trans-unit.note: Button to add a new item
Button to return to the previous view
Button to cancel an action
Button to clear the current value
Button to continue to the next step
Button to dismiss a view, when the user is finished with it
Button to hide the selected item
Button to open a menu of additional actions for the current item
Button to cancel an action, making it clear it will be possible to do this again later
Button to dismiss an alert
Button to show related settings in the Settings app on iOS

trans-unit.note: Button to show related settings in the System Preferences app on macOS
Button used in an alert to quit the app
Button to save the current changes
Button to begin a search
Button that changes a list of items to select or edit mode
Button to open the settings view
Button that shows fewer rows in a table
Button that shows more rows in a table
Button used in an alert to open a web site with more information
Button to automatically send all crash reports
Button to ignore a crash report, without sending it

trans-unit.source: Would you like to send a report so we can fix the problem?

trans-unit.note: Message for an laert shown after the app has crashed
Button to send a crash report

trans-unit.target: アーカイブを空にする
trans-unit.note: Button to delete all archived items
Button to confirm that all archived items should be deleted

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete your archive? All of your archived items will be permanently deleted.
trans-unit.target: 本当にアーカイブを空にしますか？アーカイブにある項目を完全に削除します。この操作は取り消せません。
trans-unit.note: Message for an alert confirming whether to delete all archived items

trans-unit.target: アーカイブを空にする
trans-unit.note: Title for an alert related to deleting archived items
Button to delete web site cookies

trans-unit.target: クッキーは削除されました
trans-unit.note: Message for an alert shown when web site cookies are successfully deleted
Title for an alert related to deleting web site cookies
Button to delete cached location data, used for the map view

trans-unit.source: Your location cache has been cleared.
trans-unit.note: Message for an alert shown when location cache data is successfully deleted
Title for an alert related to deleting location cache data

trans-unit.target: 保存したパスワードを削除
trans-unit.note: Button to delete saved passwords
Button to confirm that saved passwords should be deleted

trans-unit.source: Some of your passwords could not be deleted. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: いくつかのパスワードを削除することができませんでした。再試行してください。
trans-unit.note: Message explaining that some saved passwords could not be deleted

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete your saved passwords?
trans-unit.target: 本当保存してある、すべてのパスワードを削除しますか？
trans-unit.note: Message for an alert confirming that saved passwords should be deleted

trans-unit.source: All of your saved passwords have been deleted.
trans-unit.target: すべての保存したパスワードが削除されました。
trans-unit.note: Message confirming that all saved passwords were successfully deleted

trans-unit.source: All of your saved passwords have been deleted, except for your junecloud.com sync password.
trans-unit.target: junecloud.comの同期パスワード以外、すべての保存したパスワードが削除されました。
trans-unit.note: Message confirming that all saved passwords were successfully deleted, except for the Junecloud sync password

trans-unit.target: 保存したパスワードを削除
trans-unit.note: Title for an alert related to deleting saved passwords

trans-unit.source: There was an error loading your data
trans-unit.target: データの読み込みにエラーが発生しました
trans-unit.note: Title for a database error while loading

trans-unit.source: There was an error saving your data
trans-unit.target: データの保存にエラーが発生しました
trans-unit.note: Title for a database error while saving

trans-unit.source: If you continue to see this error, please try deleting and reinstalling the app, or visit junecloud.com/support for help.
trans-unit.target: このエラー画面が表示された場合は、一度アプリケーションを削除後に再度App Storeよりインストールを行ってください。もしくは junecloud.com/support (英語) をご覧ください。
trans-unit.note: Recovery suggestion for a database error on iOS

trans-unit.source: If you continue to see this error, please try resetting your data, or visit junecloud.com/support for help.
trans-unit.target: エラーが出続ける場合は一旦リセットをするか junecloud.com/support （英語）をご参照ください。
trans-unit.note: Recovery suggestion for a database error on macOS

trans-unit.source: This item could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 商品が見つかりませんでした
trans-unit.note: Message shown when Quick Look is not able to load an item
Button to confirm that the database should be reset

trans-unit.source: There was a problem resetting your data. You may want to try again, or delete and reinstall the app. If you continue to have problems, contact us at junecloud.com/support for help.
trans-unit.target: あなたのデータをリセットする際に問題が発生しました。再試行してください。もしくはアプリケーションを再インストールする必要があります。引き続き問題が発生する場合は、 junecloud.com/support （英語）をご参照ください。
trans-unit.note: Message for an alert explaining that the database could not be reset

trans-unit.target: データがリセットされました
trans-unit.note: Title for an alert explaining that the database could not be reset

trans-unit.source: This will delete all of your data and preferences. If your data is not synced with iCloud or Junecloud, it will be lost. If you’re not sure, contact us at junecloud.com/support for help.
trans-unit.target: iCloudやJunecloudで同期しているすべてのデータをすべてリセットします。何かわからないことがある場合は junecloud.com/support （英語）をご参照ください。
trans-unit.note: Message for an alert confirming whether the database should be reset, with an explanation that data will be lost if it is not synced online, and a URL for help

trans-unit.source: Your data and preferences have been deleted.
trans-unit.target: データや設定は削除されました。
trans-unit.note: Message for an alert explaining that the database was reset successfully

trans-unit.target: データがリセットされました
trans-unit.note: Title for an alert confirming that the database was reset successfully

trans-unit.target: データをリセットしていいですか？
trans-unit.note: Title for an alert confirming whether the database should be reset
Button used to confirm that iCloud sync data should be reset

trans-unit.source: If you’re having problems with iCloud syncing, you may need to reset it. This will delete the app’s sync data from iCloud, then re-sync everything in the app back to iCloud.
trans-unit.target: iCloudの同期に問題がある場合は、リセットする必要があるかもしれません。これにより、iCloudからアプリの同期データが削除され、アプリ内のすべてのデータがiCloudに再同期されます。
trans-unit.note: Message for an alert confirming whether iCloud sync data should be reset, explaining what will happen

trans-unit.target: iCloudの同期をリセットする
trans-unit.note: Title for an alert confirming whether iCloud sync data should be reset

Label below a number of days countdown, for example '8 days'
Number of days countdown: {number} days, for example '8 days'

Number of months countdown: {number} month, for example '1 month'

Label below a number of months countdown, for example '3 months'

Very short label below a number of months countdown when space is limited, for example '3 mos.'

Label for a setting to enable logging

trans-unit.target: Apple Watchのログを有効にする
trans-unit.note: Label for a setting to enable logging on Apple Watch

trans-unit.source: If something isn’t working right, turn on logs and recreate the problem. Then return here, tap Share Logs, then “Send to Junecloud”.
trans-unit.target: 何かがうまくいかない場合は、ログをオンにして問題を再現します。その後、ここに戻り、「ログを共有」をタップし、「Junecloudに送信」をタップします。
trans-unit.note: Message explaining when debug logs might be useful and how to share them, used on iOS

trans-unit.source: If something isn’t working right, turn on logs and recreate the problem. Then return here, click Show Logs, and send the files to us.
trans-unit.target: 何かがうまくいかない場合は、ログをオンにして問題を再現します。その後、ここに戻って「ログを表示」をクリックし、ファイルを送信してください。
trans-unit.note: Message explaining when debug logs might be useful and how to share them, used on macOS
Button to share log files
Button to reveal log files in a file browser
Title for debug log settings view

trans-unit.target: Apple Watchからログを転送する

trans-unit.source: Currently there aren’t any logs to send. Make sure logs are enabled, use the app to recreate your problem, and then try again later.
trans-unit.target: 現在、送信するログはありません。ログが有効になっていることを確認し、アプリを使用して問題を再現し、後でもう一度試してみてください。
